about_the_game: You start with nothing, then you can collect supplies and rescue survivors. Organize citizens, adjust contradictions, and collect taxes reasonably. Build a base, build defenses, and defend your home. Upgrade technology, raise an army, fight the four sides. Get married, have kids, take over the world.This is the trial version of 《The Way Of Kings》, to play the full game, please buy the full version.
